meanings.definition: A color between yellow and green
meanings.sent1: The chartreuse leaves on the tree shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She painted her bedroom walls a lovely shade of chartreuse.
meanings.sent3: The chartreuse frog hopped happily through the grass.
meanings.sent4: The chartreuse glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
meanings.sent5: The chartreuse of the traffic light signaled it was safe to cross.

meanings.definition: A French liqueur made from distilled alcohol flavored with herbs and colored with chlorophyll
meanings.sent1: The bartender mixed a delicious cocktail with chartreuse liqueur.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed sipping on chartreuse after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chartreuse liqueur added a unique twist to the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The chartreuse bottle gleamed on the shelf behind the bar.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of chartreuse filled the room as they toasted to friendship.
